---
category: news
title: "Artificial intelligence learns to visualize extensive datasets"
excerpt: "A new AI algorithm developed by researchers at the Finnish Center for Artificial Intelligence is aimed at visualizing datasets as clearly as possible. The project demonstrated that the solution chosen independently by the algorithm was often very close to that most commonly favored by humans."
